customProperties.armorEffects: When you would grapple a creature or be grappled, both you and the other creature take 3 piercing damage at the start of your turn.
customProperties.weaponEffects: Weapons gain a +2 to Damage Rolls and a -1 to hit.

entries.name: Properties
entries: Armor Effects: When you would grapple a creature or be grappled, both you and the other creature take 3 piercing damage at the start of your turn.
Weapon Effects: Weapons gain a +2 to Damage Rolls and a -1 to hit.
Additional Effects: Material for Demon Armor (10 Plates)
